name: ThinkBig
description:
Made for the Toe Jam #1 with the theme Space. I decided to use it as a synonym of volume.
Your goal is to move your character (a blue-outlined box) as far as possible from the starting point while growing as much as possible, without the possibility of shrinking.

The controls are as follow:

W/Z: Move upwards

S: Move downwards

A/Q: Move to the left

D: Move to the right

Spacebar: Grow!

Have fun, comment with your best score and don't hesitate to contact me if there's anything wrong with it.

With love,

lacaulac
